title: ೋღ What's There Not to Love?  ೋღ  🌺 Prelease H301
posting_body: Use this link for more information:
Did you take a close look at this fantastic floorplan?
It actually has two, huge, lighted walk-in closets in the bedroom!!
Imagine all the fun you'll have filling them up!!
The bathroom even has two sinks in it!!
This end unit is styled with vaulted ceilings and new carpet, this is the home you've been waiting for!!
Available to prelease today, we're only a phone call away!!
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 700 Sq.
Experience the benefit of a private community with the convenience of a fantastic location!
Nestled in a quiet wooded setting with fine dining, superb shopping and the Seattle ferry only minutes away.
Easy highway access makes your commute a dream come true!
Two and a half monthly rent
From highway 3, exit Austin Drive and turn right ) from southbound hwy 3, exit Austin Drive and turn left over freeway).
Erlands Point Apartments will be on the right with a shared entrance with the Naval Hospital.
